tool_description:
**Get Twitter trends with rich outcomes.**

* The results are updated every half an hour.
* [Valid woeid values (62 country)](https://rapidapi.com/brkygt88/api/twitter-trends5/tutorials/woeid-list)
* If you have any country/city you would like to be added, please contact us. (For Pro subscription users)
name: Twitter Trends
title: Twitter Trends

api_list.name: trends
api_list.description: Returns the top 50 trending topics for a [woeid](https://rapidapi.com/brkygt88/api/twitter-trends5/tutorials/woeid-list)
